</title>

<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 607 <sup>4.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn bracers

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These stiff leather armguards grant you a +1 item bonus to AC and saving throws, and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5. You can affix [talismans](/Equipment.aspx?Category=15&Subcategory=19) to _bracers of armor_ as though they were light armor.
